channel.title: How can I add some stuff ..?
channel.description:
How can I add ::yell command to my serv? What file do I need to edit and what do I need to put there?
How can I add some NPC's and how can I change what they drop and the drop rates?

item.title: How can I add some stuff ..?
item.dc:creator: @_Steven ©Steven©
item.description:
@_Steven wrote:

Nope,

The client class, client.java.

public class client

That is why the call it the ‘client class’.

Because it is a class named client.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I add some stuff ..?
item.dc:creator: @_Steven ©Steven©
item.description:
@_Steven wrote:

client class.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5)
{
    PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);
}

item.title: How can I add some stuff ..?
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

[quote=“Hey*, post:1, topic:227456”]How can I add ::yell command to my serv? What file do I need to edit and what do I need to put there?

How can I add some NPC’s and how can I change what they drop and the drop rates?[/quote]

Server tutorials have purposes.

Autospawn.CFG = NPC spawning.

public void customcommand

^ That is the void you add in commands.
I’ll let some other non lazy fucker make you a yell command =D
